channel.title: Mifumi News and Events
channel.description: This is an rss feed of the latest News and Events at Mifumi Project

item.title: MIFUMI analyzed as a case study
item.description: [CDATA[ In an article "Women's Association in Uganda", the authors used MIFUMI and FOWODE to briefly present the history of women's organizations in Uganda since independence, as characterized by their relationship with the state. ]]

item.title: Tororo Bridal Gifts Ordinance
item.description: [CDATA[ Tororo District Council has repealed the 1950 Bukedi Bride Price Law and changed it to Tororo District Bridal Gift Ordinance. ]]

item.title: Three Villages to benefit from Rural Solar Electrification
item.description: [CDATA[ Upon hearing about MIFUMIâ€™s struggle to empower the rural abused women during the MDG3 campaign , Roy Bunker visited some Villages in with the very poorest people citing them as beneficiaries ]]

item.title: MDG3
item.description: [CDATA[ Read about the MDG3 campaign in Uganda. ]]
